divs: Sighting Detailsstood out there watching it for 30 minutes then the dogs started barking alot then quiet up, like the area got silent like time stood still, and it slowing lighten but still bright enough to see, well i hope it was an ufo, would be my first sighting
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Stuart

Summary: stood still for the past 30 minutes flashing blue light red then bright red and white
